content:
From: Erin Power <xampprocky@icloud.com>
Hello everyone,

We have a small update with the all hands. The University of Macedonia, has offered to give us their corporate discount with some hotels. I've updated the website (linked below) with the complete listing. Note weâ€™re still in progress on getting the discount code with all of the hotels, however I wanted to send this out as soon as possible to let people know.

Hotel Recommendations: https://rust-lang.github.io/all-hands-2020/location.html#hotel-recommendations

As always, if you're unsure about anything when planning your trip, feel free to get in contact with us, and we'll do our best to help you out.

Thank you for your time,

Erin (@XAMPPRocky)
